ygData.subject: Re: Geographical Directory of Smithing...
ygData.msgSnippet: All supplies are available in Freeport, I did not want to go there either because of the grifs, but runnning to highhold pass everytime i needed ore in Qeynos
ygData.messageBody:
All supplies are available in Freeport, I did not want to go there either
because of the grifs, but runnning to highhold pass everytime i needed ore
in Qeynos and having the file molds in the karnas is absolutely no fun.

Freeport is an excellent lvl 11+ area but bad for 5-10 because your targets
are in the middle of the commons where the grifs are.

Ore is in the north freeport near the bard guild, forges are everywhere,
molds and metal are available in east freeport as are skewer and scaler molds.

C
